metadata.title: CVE-2024-32484 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An reflected XSS vulnerability exists in the handling of invalid paths inthe Flask server in Ankitects Anki 24.04. A specially crafted flashcard canlead to JavaScript code execution and result in an arbitrary file read. Anattacker can share a malicious flashcard to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: anki package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
